CAPTION FIG1.png: 'Figure 1: Timing of localization of cellin, coronis and Abp1 to actin patches. (A,B) Single-frame images from a confocal time-lapse movie of cells expressing Cofl-RFP Abp1-GFP (A) or Abp1-GFP and Cral-dinner2 (B) are shown in the upper panels. Two isolated actin patches are shown in the rectangles on the bottom. Scale bars 3 \\(\\mu\\)m. (C) Mean fluorescence intensity (green and red lines) and average distance (blue line) for nine actin patches over time. Left, Cofl-RFP Abp1-GFP cells. Right, Cral-dinner2 Abp1-GFP cells. Error bars are s.e.m. Images were collected at room temperature.\n\n'
CAPTION FIG2.png:
'

**Fig. 2. Timing of cofilin, coronin and Alp1 localization to actin patches.**

(**A,B**) Single-frame images from a coefical time-lapse movie of cells expressing Cof1-RFP and Cm1-GFP (A) or _N_ip1-GFP and Cofl-RFP (B).

Seak bars: 3 \(\mu\)m. (**C**) Mean fluorescence intensity (green and red lines) of

coetrical actin patches from cells in A (n=5) or B (n=10) were plotted over time.

Error bars indicate s.e.m. images were collected at room temperature.

'
CAPTION FIG3.png:
'
Fig. 3: **Localization of cormin and Alpi in _cof1_ mutants of different classes.****(A-E)** Class 1 to Class 5 _cof1_ mutants are shown in panels A-E, respectively. Wild-type cells illustrate the Class 1 phenotype (A). Crm1-adime2 Alpi-GFP or Crm1-adime2 Alpi-GFP were expressed in wild-type and _cof7_ cells. Cells were cultured at 34\({}^{\circ}\)C, and two-color confocal images were captured sequentially on equatorial cell planes. Arrows in D indicate abnormal Crm1 aggregates. Scale bars: 3 μm.

'
CAPTION FIG4.png:
'

**Fig. 4. Localization of cofilin, coroain and Alpt in _arm1A_ and _ajp1A_ null mutant live cells. (A) Wild-type and _sm1A_ cells expressing Aip1-GFP and Cof1-RFP. Two-color images were collected with a wide-field fluorescence microscope at room temperature. (B) Wild-type and _ajp1A_ cells expressing Cml-GFP and LifeAct-RFP, to label actin cables and patches. (C) Wild-type, _CRW_ and _sm1A_ _ap1A_ cells expressing Cof1-RFP and LifeAct-GFP. Cells were cultured at 30degC. Arrows in B and C indicate Cml-GFP-, Cof1-RFP- or LifeAct-GFP-labeled actin cables. Scale bars: 3 um.

'

CAPTION FIG6.png: "Fig. 6. Quantitative motion analysis of Abpt-GFP-labeled actin patches in wild-type, _eq1-19_, _aq1A_ and _eq1-19_, _aq1A_ cells. (A-F) Panels are as described for Fig. 4. Student's \\(t\\)-tests for statistical significance were performed in E, as indicated. Strains and numbers of patches as follows: wild type YJC6537 (n=531), YJC6538 (n=43) red YJC6543 (n=511); _eq1-19_. YJC6785 (n=351), YJC6786 (n=63) red YJC6787 (n=40); _aq1A_ YJC6782 (n=60), YJC6785 (n=46) red YJC6784 (n=58); _aq1A_ eq1-19_, YJC9623 (n=851), YJC9624 (n=61) and YJC6625 (n=31).\n\n"
CAPTION FIG7.png: 'Figure 7: Quantitative motion analysis of Abp1-GFP-labeled actin patches in wild-type, \\(\\mathbf{cml\\Delta}\\), \\(\\mathbf{apl\\Delta}\\) and \\(\\mathbf{cml\\Delta}\\), \\(\\mathbf{apl\\Delta}\\) cells. (A-F) Panels are as described for Fig. 5. The data for \\(\\mathbf{cml\\Delta}\\) and \\(\\mathbf{apl\\Delta}\\) cells are the same as those in Figs 4 and 6, respectively, reproduced here for comparison. Strains and numbers of patches as follows: wild-type: YJC6337 (a=80), YJC6338 (a=88) and YJC6434 (_n_=67); _cml\\Delta_, \\(\\mathbf{apl\\Delta}\\), \\(\\mathbf{apl\\Delta}\\), \\(\\mathbf{YJC6817}\\) (a=27) and YJC6818 (a=28).\n\n'
CAPTION FIG8.png: 'Figure 8: Quantitative motion analysis of Abp1-GFP-labeled actin patches in wild-type, eqf1-4, eqf1-5 and eqf1-22 cells. (A-F) Panels are as described for Fig. 5. States and numbers of patches are as follows: wild-type YJC6516 (a=85), YJC6521 (a=85) and YJC6522 (a=75), cof1-4: YJC6515 (r=17), YJC6519 (a=27) and YJC6520 (a=28), cof1-3: YJC65439 (a=33), YJC65440 (n=11) and YJC4441 (a=9), cof1-22: YJC4427 (a=25), YJC64428 (n=9) and YJC4429 (a=11).\n\n'
